programme.title: Gohatto
Tabu
Gohatto
programme.desc:
Gohatto: Directed by Nagisa Ôshima. With Takeshi Kitano, Ryûhei Matsuda, Shinji Takeda, Tadanobu Asano. The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0213682/","name":"Gohatto","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyMzBkZjAtNDEyYi00ZDY1LTkyZWItNjQwYmZhNjQ5MDJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIwNDY4NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0213682/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TATBOY"},"dateCreated":"2001-12-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"An Exquisite travelogue to another place, time, and culture","reviewBody":"Nagisa Oshima's work is always visually exquisite. He has that finely honed, generations-old Japanese eye for detail which has served his artistry well over the last 50 years. It reveals itself to be the difference in the world of film that a Monet, Michelangelo, or Van Gogh is to sidewalk chalk drawings.

Decades ago, Oshima set out explore new territories, to leave formula and standard, approved plot progressions behind and delve into the deeper recesses of the human experience. What comes out of that are works of storytelling which require more attention and involvement on the part of the viewer than your typical Michael Bay or Renny Harlin flick. Not that pure escapist entertainment is a bad thing; far from it. But you don't generally come away from one of those features wanting to go sit at a table with your friends, staying up to the wee hours discussing what you've just seen and all the ramifications of each scene. In simpler terms, they don't enrich your intellect! (I think even Bay?s and Harlin?s most ardent fans can agree with me on that part :-) ).

"Gohatto" is the Japanese word meaning "Taboo" in its simplest form, so you know going in your about to see something out of the ordinary. Oshima has long had a fascination with the dichotomies in Japanese culture (and frankly most cultures) between how behavior is proscribed and how the more primal, instinctual urges (mostly sex) always find their way to the surface in spite of those mores. Oshima has also found a fascination in seeing how both Western and Eastern cultures have, at one time or another (or more than one), put strict moral taboos on homosexuality, adultery, and even on prostitution, but these strictures have never eliminated or even slowed down their existence.

"Gohatto" takes us into a world 150 years ago where such things don't exist on the surface but are fully integrated into what is real life just beneath. Whether such subject matter, or exploring Eastern cultures, particularly interests you or not, if you're interested in being challenged by the art that you see, "Gohatto" (like Peter Greenaway's recent "The Pillow Book") is a must-see film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7474,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1999-12-18","keywords":"19th century,samurai,japan,rivalry,prostitute","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001429/","name":"Takeshi Kitano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0559430/","name":"Ryûhei Matsuda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0847487/","name":"Shinji Takeda"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651915/","name":"Nagisa Ôshima"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007001/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060607/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0793050/","name":"Ryôtarô Shiba"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651915/","name":"Nagisa Ôshima"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Babyteeth
Zaraza
Ill: Final Contagium
programme.desc:
Babyteeth: Directed by Shannon Murphy. With Eliza Scanlen, Michelle Lotters, Toby Wallace, Sora Wakaki. Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8399664/","name":"Babyteeth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGRhMzRkYzEtMDBjNy00YjkxLWJjNzctNzEwNGNhZDUyZWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8399664/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"evanston_dad"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well Acted But Very Depressing","reviewBody":"Well acted but very depressing.

Eliza Scanlan gives a fascinating performance as a young woman who's going through cancer treatment and falls for a drug addict who may or may not be good for her. Her parents (Essie Davis and Ben Mendelsohn) are dysfunctional and unraveling and have drug problems of their own. They don't like her daughter's boyfriend and under normal circumstances probably wouldn't tolerate him. But he's the only thing that brings their daughter some respite from the hell she's going through, so they sort of adopt him as their own.

"Babyteeth" is a coming of age movie that's set apart from others like it because of the protagonist's existential crisis. Scanlan's character is as immature in some ways as any sixteen year old, but at the same time is being asked to summon up reserves of maturity to deal with the ultimate curve ball life has to throw at us. How do you balance the emotional and hormonal ups and downs of teen romance with the possibility of your impending death?

The film is a bit monotonous in tone and starts to feel like a grind after a while. But again, it's worth seeing for the performances and for the unsentimental treatment of the subject matter that would have possibly segued into the maudlin in different hands. The ending scene is the most devastating thing I've seen in a movie this year.

Grade: B+","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14022,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"MA-17","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2020-07-23","keywords":"pills,dog,teenage girl loses her hair,teenage girl wears a wig,hospital","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Babyteeth","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi678936601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM2ODA5ZDItMjJjMS00ZTYxLTk3ODItOTNiMGEwZGQ2NzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM2ODA5ZDItMjJjMS00ZTYxLTk3ODItOTNiMGEwZGQ2NzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7340546/","name":"Eliza Scanlen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9334013/","name":"Michelle Lotters"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3108675/","name":"Toby Wallace"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2221724/","name":"Shannon Murphy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0234956/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0658237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017733/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1514808/","name":"Rita Kalnejais"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: We mnie
programme.desc: Sandra (Małgorzata Gorol) świętuje swój wieczór panieński. Zbliża się dzień ślubu, ale przedtem musi poddać się aborcji - płód ma wady genetyczne. Do szpitala jedzie z nią narzeczony. Z każdą kolejną minutą mężczyzna wydaje się Sandrze coraz bardziej obcy. Po zabiegu kobieta postanawia szczerze z nim porozmawiać.

credits.actor: Małgorzata Gorol

programme.title: Echo
programme.desc: Kinga (Anna Bieżyńska) jest młodą kobietą, której udało się pokonać ciężką chorobę. Po jej przebyciu stara się na nowo odnaleźć w świecie. Okazuje się to trudne. Dziewczyna ma koszmary. Również jej relacje z chłopakiem, choć z pozoru dobre, są raczej oziębłe. Do Kingi długo nie dociera fakt, że coś jej dolega. Tymczasem koszmary stopniowo przeradzają się w widzenia na jawie. Rzeczywistość zlewa się ze snami. W końcu trudno jest Kindze ocenić, co dzieje się naprawdę.

programme.title: Mizaru
programme.desc: Na przedmieściach Bombaju para młodych ludzi próbuje wygospodarować dla siebie odrobinę prywatności. Jest to trudne, ponieważ znajdują się w miejscu publicznym. Spotkanie szybko przerywają im ludzie pilnujący w Indiach zachowywania zasad moralności.

programme.title: The Book of Life
W dobrej wierze
The Good Lie
programme.desc:
The Book of Life: Directed by Jorge R. Gutiérrez. With Diego Luna, Zoe Saldana, Channing Tatum, Ron Perlman. Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2262227/","name":"The Book of Life","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzOTgzNDYzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTgxMTkyMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2262227/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shawneofthedead"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Messy and overstuffed, but crackling with life, energy and colour.","reviewBody":"Many things could have gone wrong with The Book Of Life. This boisterous, big-hearted animated film is bursting with ideas and colour, stuffed to the brim with - one suspects - pretty much every idea that struck writer-director Jorge Gutierrez's fancy. Indeed, the final film plays very much like the charming but unpolished debut of a filmmaker who can't quite believe he was lucky enough to get the attention of producer Guillermo del Toro, and has no intention of wasting the opportunity in case it never comes around again. As a result, The Book Of Life practically trembles with too many ideas and influences, but remains so earnest and inventive that it's easy to forgive its predictable, overstuffed plot.

In a small Mexican town on the Day Of The Dead, we meet the protagonists of the story: steadfast, earnest Manolo (voiced by Diego Luna), who would rather strum a guitar than fight a bull in the tradition of his forefathers; brash, adventurous Joaquin (Channing Tatum), who becomes the town hero in trying to avenge the murder of his father by bandits; and spunky, intelligent Maria (Zoe Saldana), daughter of the mayor who inevitably wins the hearts of both young men. The stakes, however, are higher than they could ever imagine: the two godly rulers of the underworld, La Muerte (Kate del Castillo) and Xibalba (Ron Perlman), have gambled dominion over each other's lands on the outcome of the love triangle.

It would be an understatement to say that there's a lot going on in The Book Of Life. The film covers everything from a mystical medal that lends invulnerability to anyone who wears it, to a tantalising love-hate relationship between the two gods, while spiced up with musical interludes galore. (It's not often that the film's hero will pause to belt out a soul-searching rendition of Radiohead's Creep, but that kind of thing happens all the time in The Book Of Life.) Mix it all up with retellings of Mexican folklore, including visits to the joyously colourful Land of the Remembered and the ghostly grey Land of the Forgotten, and the film can be a somewhat frenetic viewing experience, to say the least.

But, for all that Gutierrez packs his film full of ideas and details, he also manages to make most of it work very well. The love triangle may be trite, but there's nevertheless enough heart and humour holding Manolo, Maria and Joaquin together. Manolo's relationships with his dad Carlos (Hector Elizondo) and his departed mom Carmen (Ana de la Reguera) are coloured in with surprising depth as well. It's also wonderful to see a love triangle centred around a girl who knows her own mind - and rest assured that Maria speaks it often enough to make a real impact.

The Book Of Life also doubles as a very welcome riot of imagination and tradition. Every frame of the film is beautifully and thoughtfully designed, down to the fact that Manolo seems to have been intricately crafted out of wood. Moreover, instead of shying away from its Mexican roots to increase its global marketability, the film firmly embraces them. This gives Gutierrez room to craft some delicately dark moments in a graveyard or two, reminding everyone that those who have died can still live as long as they're remembered by the ones who loved them. And yet, the film never descends into darkness, instead tapping into the giddying energy of a fiesta - most memorably in a journey through the Land of the Remembered - complete with heady bursts of colour and music.

There's no denying that Gutierrez's film can occasionally be too much to handle. It's loud and almost cheerfully silly, tossing pop songs and Mexican folklore into a mix that sometimes doesn't work. But, at its best, The Book Of Life is like a rambunctious puppy: messy, loud and insistent, but radiating so much life and charm that it becomes quite impossible to resist.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":68224,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2014-10-15","keywords":"afterlife,mexico,death character,bullfight,serenade","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi840674329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0Mjg3ODI5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzM1NTA0MjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0Mjg3ODI5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzM1NTA0MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastical worlds where he must face his greatest fears.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0526019/","name":"Diego Luna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0757855/","name":"Zoe Saldana"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1475594/","name":"Channing Tatum"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1509613/","name":"Jorge R. Gutiérrez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051162/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0215981/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1509613/","name":"Jorge R. Gutiérrez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0486007/","name":"Doug Langdale"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wojowniczka
Pompon Girl
programme.desc: Ava (Pénélope-Rose Léveque) pracuje jako klaun. Jest zabawna oraz pewna siebie. Pewnej nocy, kiedy wraca do domu z burleskowego show ze swoimi przyjaciółmi, napotkany mężczyzna prowokuje ich i obraża. Dziewczyna postanawia się bronić. Odpowiada na zaczepki napastnika. W wyniku konfrontacji zostaje pobita. Twierdzi, że wszystko jest w porządku aż do momentu, gdy dowiaduje się o czymś ważnym - podczas ataku była w ciąży.

credits.actor: Pénélope Lévêque
Félicie Baille
Julien Drion
Bruno Clairefond

programme.title: Troche w ciazy
Trochę w ciąży
programme.desc: Troche w ciazy: Directed by Piotr Matwiejczyk. With Sylwia Boron, Robert Buczynski, Piotr Matwiejczyk, Andrzej Galla. The story of the relationship between the energetic and resourceful Gosia and the lazy and slightly reckless Wojtek, whose relationship is put to the test. They are going through a deep crisis. programme.title: Paul Newman: Błękitne oczy Hollywood
programme.desc: Bożyszcze światowego kina, Paul Newman, zasłynął licznymi kreacjami aktorskimi. Przeszedł do historii jako Butch Cassidy, nieugięty Luke, Rocky Graziano i Hud Bannon. Twórcy filmu przestawiają bogate dossier artysty, i to nie tylko aktorskie, ale też reżyserskie i producenckie. Poza tym opowiadają o życiu prywatnym Newmana. Pokazują go jako ojca, obywatela oraz pasjonata motoryzacji.

programme.title: Rykoszety
Rykoszety
programme.desc: Rykoszety: Directed by Jakub Radej. With Stanislaw Linowski, Zuzanna Zielinska, Tomasz Schuchardt, Marta Scislowicz. Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. Two coal miner brothers react differently to the oppressive police state. While Tadek prefers to retreat into neutrality, Janek chooses active engagement in the democratic underground. When Janek asks Tadek to store some anti-government leaflets on the second anniversary of Solidarity's 1980 strikes, he triggers a spiral of events that will have everyone's allegiances and characters severely tested." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8658144/","name":"Rykoszety","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc0ZGJlOTUtYWM5NS00MjY3LWE5YzYtNWQxMjYyNDU5NjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. programme.title: London Town
London Town
programme.desc:
London Town: Directed by Derrick Borte. With Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Daniel Huttlestone, Dougray Scott, Natascha McElhone. In '70s London, a 14 year-old boy is introduced to the Clash by his estranged mother. It changes his life forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1724597/","name":"London Town","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3NjU2MjYzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk4NzgwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In '70s London, a 14 year-old boy is introduced to the Clash by his estranged mother. It changes his life forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1724597/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"katzco-545-81470"},"dateCreated":"2016-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A film that is music for the eyes, the ears and the heart!","reviewBody":"Every once in a while a little film, with a tiny budget and a whole lot of heart, comes along and knocks you off your feet. London Town fulfills all the aspects of that category. 

I won't bother to give you a blow by blow description of the story, that's easily found elsewhere. I will tell you I was more than thoroughly entertained and, since it was a 48 hour rental via my VOD system, I took the opportunity to watch it three times because it was just that good! The film is endearing, funny and the performances are stellar, especially the youngsters. Huttlestone is already on his way as a multi-talent, but Nell Williams was a new revelation for me and she shines here. 

If for no other reason, you need to see this film for the incredibly brilliant work of Jonathan Rhys Meyers as Joe Strummer. He is simply mesmerizing and delivers a musical performance equal to that of any contemporary or historical rock star. (As a veteran of 7 Stones and 14 WHO concerts, I feel justified in that statement.) Derrick Borte managed to assemble a superb group of musicians to portray the rest of the band and the results are magical. 

London Town is a special film, with something for everyone to love. Don't miss it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2297,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2016-10-07","keywords":"the clash,pantyhose,miniskirt,fishnet pantyhose,losing virginity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3651909145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4NDMyMTU2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTM1MDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4NDMyMTU2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTM1MDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 70's London, a teenager is introduced to The Clash by his estranged mother and it changes his life forever."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001667/","name":"Jonathan Rhys Meyers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4948519/","name":"Daniel Huttlestone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0779084/","name":"Dougray Scott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0097517/","name":"Derrick Borte"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296298/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030755/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0375102/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114226/","name":"Matt Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0839503/","name":"Sonya Gildea"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792202/","name":"Kirsten Sheridan"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

A Vigilante
programme.desc: A Vigilante: Directed by Sarah Daggar-Nickson. With Olivia Wilde, Morgan Spector, Kyle Catlett, Estefania Tejeda. After escaping her violent husband, Sadie makes it her life's mission to help free others in danger. After months of rigorous training in survival skills, boxing, and lethal martial arts, she is back with a vengeance." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6211976/","name":"A Vigilante","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxNjhlOWQtZGU1MS00M2JiLWI4NDUtMDU0ZWU2ODkzMDk2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODk0OTcwMTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"After escaping her violent husband, Sadie makes it her life's mission to help free others in danger. After months of rigorous training in survival skills, boxing, and lethal martial arts, she is back with a vengeance.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6211976/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"brainwerx-1"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie. Hard theme.","reviewBody":"I disagree with a couple of the reviews regarding pacing. I think the movie shows what abused women (and in some cases kids and men) go through. You live in silence. You're afraid to tell people. And you have to move carefully around the abuser. That, I think, is what this movie is trying to portray. It's not as straightforward as some reviewers have mentioned. And Olivia Wilde is amazing in this!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8221,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-03-29","keywords":"tied feet,vigilante,vigilantism,domestic abuse,advocate","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3222781209","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODRkOGI5YjgtYmYyZS00YWU5LWE4NzctMzQyZThlMThhMmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODRkOGI5YjgtYmYyZS00YWU5LWE4NzctMzQyZThlMThhMmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A vigilante helps victims escape their domestic abusers.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1312575/","name":"Olivia Wilde","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1767528/","name":"Morgan Spector","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3714535/","name":"Kyle Catlett"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3106829/","name":"Sarah Daggar-Nickson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0111279/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017712/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0160719/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3106829/","name":"Sarah Daggar-Nickson"],"duration":"PT1H31M"</script><metacontent="

Blue Iguana
programme.desc: Blue Iguana: Directed by Hadi Hajaig. With Sam Rockwell, Phoebe Fox, Ben Schwartz, Peter Ferdinando. Ex-jailbirds Eddie and Paul are on parole and working in a New York diner. Their lives are a dead end. That is, until English lawyer Katherine Rookwood walks into the diner with an offer they can't refuse." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2316479/","name":"Blue Iguana","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Y0ZmEwODAtODQzOC00ZjcwLTg5MjMtMWM3OTM0YmUzYWQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzM5Mjg3ODg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ex-jailbirds Eddie and Paul are on parole and working in a New York diner. Their lives are a dead end. That is, until English lawyer Katherine Rookwood walks into the diner with an offer they can't refuse.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2316479/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"paulharvey-70154"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quirky, off-beat, enjoyable","reviewBody":"Despite negative reviews, I found this very enjoyable. The London/cockney setting is excellent and may well appeal to an American audience unaware of this aspect of British society and watching Rockwell trying to speak cockney is very amusing. The characters are all very quirky with their own little foibles, the plot, although a little far fetched, moves along at a good pace. Nice little touches from known actors, especially Phoebe Fox as the somewhat corrupt lawyer and Amanda Donohoe as the foul-mouthed pub landlady as well as the bad guy telling the hit team what he is going to do to them at the end made this a worthwhile journey. Although it is not laugh out loud funny, it is rather subtle in its approach and Rockwell is just Rockwell. Recommended with a bucket of popcorn and some friends and don't believe what they say.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2018-10-05","keywords":"singing in a car,reference to the world cup,reference to trevor brooking,reference to peter withe,reference to telly savalas","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1590410009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWRmNjE5ODUtODIwMi00NWEyLWI3Y2MtODFiYzJhMGRlMjkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWRmNjE5ODUtODIwMi00NWEyLWI3Y2MtODFiYzJhMGRlMjkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Small time New York crooks Eddie and Paul are in over their heads when a cute London lawyer hires them to fly to London and steal a rare jewel. programme.title: Jestem tutaj
programme.desc: Niespodziewany przyjazd młodszego brata Stefana (Miłosz Frydrychowicz) zmusza dwudziestoletnią Hanię (Marianna Kowalewska) do zmierzenia się z trudną przeszłością i do odnowy kontaktu z dawno niewidzianą matką. Przez wzgląd na chłopaka dziewczyna musi dać szansę tej skomplikowanej relacji.

credits.actor: Marianna Kowalewska

programme.title: Na strajk!
programme.desc: Dzień z życia 19-letniego Karola, który opiekuje się dziadkiem chorym na alzheimera. Niebawem chłopak poznaje tajemnicę rodzinną związaną z dramatycznymi wydarzeniami podczas stoczniowych strajków w grudniu 1970 roku. Odkryta przeszłość zmusza go do podjęcia najważniejszej decyzji w życiu.

programme.title: Myszy i szczury
programme.desc: Dramatyczne losy małego Adasia (Miłosz Kwiecień), którego przykre doświadczenia sprzed lat odbijają się na psychice całej rodziny. Wzruszająca historia o bezgranicznej miłości, przeznaczeniu, poczuciu winy i ponoszeniu konsekwencji za swoje czyny.

programme.title: The Other Story
Cena prawdy
Sipur Acher
programme.desc: The Other Story: Directed by Avi Nesher. With Sasson Gabay, Joy Rieger, Yuval Segal, Maya Dagan. Two rebellious young women - one fleeing the chaos of secular hedonism for the disciplined comforts of faith; the other desperate to transcend her oppressive religious cross paths unexpectedly in Jerusalem, to startling consequences." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8510206/","name":"The Other Story","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYwNGQxMDMtNDBiMC00OWYyLTk5NzMtOGNjMDlhYTY4YTY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTQwMDA5NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two rebellious young women - one fleeing the chaos of secular hedonism for the disciplined comforts of faith; the other desperate to transcend her oppressive religious cross paths unexpectedly in Jerusalem, to startling consequences.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8510206/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"briefexistance"},"dateCreated":"2019-09-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Marvelous gem","reviewBody":"I'm so glad I saw this with the man himself presenting the film in the Monterrey Film Festival. Boom! the credits. When I least expect it, 2 hours have passed, I mean, not many films have that characteristic while maintaining the highest quality in terms of screenwriting and acting. I remember Avi Nesher said its movie don't have the traditional 3 act structure, which makes it very enjoyable in a fresh and interesting way. It was also very cool to watch a Israeli film without clichés or stereotypes, portraying their culture and millennial traditions with respect in a contemporary world. This is proof that if you want to make an incredibly fresh action film you don't need cars, explosions or serial murders. You need a good crew, you need to bring love to your work, you need courage to step outside the conventional boundaries without sacrificing the public's enjoyment. This exhales love and respect for the observer, and I really appreciate it. It's warm, it's interesting, it's new.\n\nBONUS! The song in the bar scene was BEAUTIFUL! I completely loved the quality of the sound, it was very rich and moving, even if I didn't understand a word.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":356,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-10-25","keywords":"morning ritual,netilat yadayim,airport,father daughter relationship,father son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Other Story","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1876343833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDI0YTk5NWMtNTNlZi00NTY4LTk1MDQtMGU3NDRkMTc0ZmNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDI0YTk5NWMtNTNlZi00NTY4LTk1MDQtMGU3NDRkMTc0ZmNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0299924/","name":"Sasson Gabay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2380472/","name":"Joy Rieger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781879/","name":"Yuval Segal"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383605/","name":"Avi Nesher"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017558/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0707371/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10032060/","name":"Noam Shpancer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383605/","name":"Avi Nesher"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

After losing her job at a local factory, a single mother enrolls in a housekeeper training program, soon landing work cleaning the Paris apartment of handsome but cocky power broker." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1641624/","name":"Ma part du gâteau","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg3ZWRkZjItZTVlOC00Zjc2LWI2YzgtMDJkMTBiMmQ2Y2FlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"After losing her job at a local factory, a single mother enrolls in a housekeeper training program, soon landing work cleaning the Paris apartment of handsome but cocky power broker.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1641624/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gerry-taylor-537-121512"},"dateCreated":"2014-05-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Film","reviewBody":"Hi

This is a great film I cannot understand the low score, some of the earlier reviewers got the point some missed it.

Its the story of a redundant woman who goes to work for the trader who helped close down the firm she worked for.

I's about class struggle, family , globalization,love, powerless of the individual.

And also it dose n't really take sides as it shows the trader as a victim too.

Might be the best film I've seen in the past year.

programme.title: The New Daughter
Córka
The New Daughter
programme.desc:
The New Daughter: Directed by Luiso Berdejo. With Kevin Costner, Ivana Baquero, Samantha Mathis, Gattlin Griffith. A single father moves his two children to rural South Carolina, only to watch his daughter exhibit increasingly strange behavior." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0951335/","name":"The New Daughter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwNTQ2MzM4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTgzNDcyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A single father moves his two children to rural South Carolina, only to watch his daughter exhibit increasingly strange behavior.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0951335/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bransurghon"},"dateCreated":"2010-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Considering The Source, Movie Is True To Form","reviewBody":"In todays, "no imagination, every bit of story must be spelled out on screen in action and with explosions" it is often to appreciate movies that make you think, draw conclusions, actually use you imagination and remember the source.

This movie is true to the short story it is based on with a good cinematic backdrop where the actors act, and everything isn't carried out on a blue/green screen. Costner's portrayal was very true to the actual character which, isn't that the point of having characters and using actors that can act.

In a genre that is quickly becoming based only on graphic, grotesque, shocking blood and gore sequences and predictable horror and grisly effects, this thriller is actually attractive for all the right reasons and should be enjoyed highly by those that appreciate true horror/thriller films as opposed to the blood soaked hacker/slasher movies that are being pumped out monthly.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14920,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-10-07","keywords":"mound,ant farm,indian burial ground,shotgun,father daughter relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The New Daughter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2034828313","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0MDM1ODA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQwNDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0MDM1ODA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQwNDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A single father moves his two children to rural South Carolina, only to watch his daughter exhibit increasingly strange behavior. programme.title: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House
Tajne źródło
Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House
programme.desc:
Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House: Directed by Peter Landesman. With Liam Neeson, Diane Lane, Marton Csokas, Tony Goldwyn. The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1972." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5175450/","name":"Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQzMDEwMjMyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjA1NTA1MzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1972.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5175450/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jdesando"},"dateCreated":"2017-10-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's another turn on history you'll want to know.","reviewBody":"Astonishing: The most famous whistle blower in history gets his own docudrama, and it's a bit dull. Mark Felt (Liam Neeson), aka "Deep Throat," is tag lined in the movie's title as "the man who brought down the White House." The 2005 Vanity Fair article finally told the story, and this rendition hints at much intrigue left untold. It's the other side of All the President's Men but not nearly as well done.

As the deputy associate director of the FBI, Felt knew so much that he couldn't be fired for fear he'd reveal all. Yes, he had control of Hoover's "private files" (lots of sexual indiscretions) after his death in 1972, and he had 31 years of service. To boot, he was a straight arrow whom the dirty tricksters in the White House should have feared.

So how could this be a dull story? In the first place, the secret actions by the Watergate burglars and the foul machinations of Nixon's henchmen are barely exposed as drama. More importantly, the seminal investigative gymnastics of Woodward and Bernstein are skimmed over in favor of a Dustin Hoffman lookalike (Julian Morris) as Woodward (Redford played it in All) looking star struck when Felt begins his covert revelations. More integral is Sandy Smith (Bruce Greenwood) of Time Magazine as felt unloads info on him as well.

While we are left with a Cliff's Notes superficial version of the events leading to Nixon's resignation, we endure the domestic dilemmas of a boozy wife (Diane Lane) disappointed that Felt was passed over for director and a missing daughter, embarrassingly attached to a commune, we find out eventually. In the latter detail rests a better story of how Felt investigated Weatherman activities with a conflict of interest angle related to his daughter. (Reagan commuted Felt's sentence for unauthorized searches).

That is to say, there is so much action in those early '70's related to Tricky Dick that the movie seems to leave behind as it gets the right angles for its many Neeson close-ups. More close-ups of the FBI activity would have been better. All the President's Men and Spotlight are far better giving you the daily details leading to their disclosures.

But, hey, it is instructive to see that 45 years ago, the FBI asserted its independence from the White House. It had a sleazy administration to buck, all the more reason to fight the good fight. If you think there is resonance today with James Comey's firing, then hope for a Deep Throat. Looks like there are candidates already working out there."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12821,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2017-09-29","keywords":"washington post,whistleblower,father daughter relationship,mother daughter relationship,hippie","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi52345113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3MzAwNjg4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDYxNjczMzI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3MzAwNjg4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDYxNjczMzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1974."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000178/","name":"Diane Lane"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190744/","name":"Marton Csokas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1481618/","name":"Peter Landesman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0742273/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0515853/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0535275/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1944541/","name":"Mark Felt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2207084/","name":"John D. IMDb data; ttnr: 5175450, Title: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House, --- Description: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House: Directed by Peter Landesman. With Liam Neeson, Diane Lane, Marton Csokas, Tony Goldwyn. The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1972." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5175450/","name":"Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQzMDEwMjMyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjA1NTA1MzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1972.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5175450/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jdesando","dateCreated":"2017-10-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's another turn on history you'll want to know.","reviewBody":"Astonishing: The most famous whistle blower in history gets his own docudrama, and it's a bit dull. Mark Felt (Liam Neeson), aka "Deep Throat," is tag lined in the movie's title as "the man who brought down the White House." The 2005 Vanity Fair article finally told the story, and this rendition hints at much intrigue left untold. It's the other side of All the President's Men but not nearly as well done.

As the deputy associate director of the FBI, Felt knew so much that he couldn't be fired for fear he'd reveal all. Yes, he had control of Hoover's "private files" (lots of sexual indiscretions) after his death in 1972, and he had 31 years of service. To boot, he was a straight arrow whom the dirty tricksters in the White House should have feared.

So how could this be a dull story? In the first place, the secret actions by the Watergate burglars and the foul machinations of Nixon's henchmen are barely exposed as drama. More importantly, the seminal investigative gymnastics of Woodward and Bernstein are skimmed over in favor of a Dustin Hoffman lookalike (Julian Morris) as Woodward (Redford played it in All) looking star struck when Felt begins his covert revelations. More integral is Sandy Smith (Bruce Greenwood) of Time Magazine as felt unloads info on him as well.

While we are left with a Cliff's Notes superficial version of the events leading to Nixon's resignation, we endure the domestic dilemmas of a boozy wife (Diane Lane) disappointed that Felt was passed over for director and a missing daughter, embarrassingly attached to a commune, we find out eventually. In the latter detail rests a better story of how Felt investigated Weatherman activities with a conflict of interest angle related to his daughter. (Reagan commuted Felt's sentence for unauthorized searches).

That is to say, there is so much action in those early '70's related to Tricky Dick that the movie seems to leave behind as it gets the right angles for its many Neeson close-ups. More close-ups of the FBI activity would have been better. All the President's Men and Spotlight are far better giving you the daily details leading to their disclosures.

But, hey, it is instructive to see that 45 years ago, the FBI asserted its independence from the White House. It had a sleazy administration to buck, all the more reason to fight the good fight. If you think there is resonance today with James Comey's firing, then hope for a Deep Throat. Looks like there are candidates already working out there.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12821,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2017-09-29","keywords":"washington post,whistleblower,father daughter relationship,mother daughter relationship,hippie","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi52345113","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3MzAwNjg4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDYxNjczMzI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3MzAwNjg4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDYxNjczMzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1974.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000178/","name":"Diane Lane","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190744/","name":"Marton Csokas"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1481618/","name":"Peter Landesman"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0742273/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0515853/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0535275/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1944541/","name":"Mark Felt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2207084/","name":"John D. programme.title: Simpatico
Simpatico
programme.desc:
Simpatico: Directed by Matthew Warchus. With Nick Nolte, Jeff Bridges, Sharon Stone, Catherine Keener. After scams at horse races and making lots of money, 3 young people split. 20 years later, one of them, a drunk, creates chaos with photos from back then." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0174204/","name":"Simpatico","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE5YjQ0MjItOTNhMS00NTliLWJjYmEtMTE1NTExNjRlZjRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After scams at horse races and making lots of money, 3 young people split. 20 years later, one of them, a drunk, creates chaos with photos from back then.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0174204/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"adnixon"},"dateCreated":"2001-07-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Disappointment","reviewBody":"I like Jeff Bridges tremendously, so I'll watch anything with him in. But this film has so many loose ends, you could make a ragrug.

Good acting by all, but a good dollop of suspension of disbelief is necessary with so many unlikely events or inconclusive nuances of the plot. Vinnie and his girlfriend checking into the same hotel and not knowing it. What was that all about? And what was Carter arranging with Simms anyway even before Vinnie turns up from the past?

The central premise seemed to be Simms's reconciliation with the past - forgive and forget. Very good, but this wasn't developed enough. Okay Carter throws it all away through guilt and wants the simple life again. But it's not believable. They can't be nineteen again.

It should have been filmed in the European style - slow and ponderous would have been so much better. But this version is too clipped and compromised with modern moviegoers tastes. Stone is very very good. Nice to see Nolte in rags again, it's his forte. Jeff is sleepwalking though. New girl terrific. Does she go back to Vinnie in the end or go with Simms? I think it's back to Vinnie. It almost works - I like movies that exercise the mind and leave loose ends to speculate on. But without the basic substance, loose ends is all Simpatico has."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3563,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-01-28","keywords":"kentucky,blackmail,scam,woman smoker,volkswagen beetle","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Simpatico","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2659385625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2JiYTA1MjItM2ZkNS00NTFhLWJiNjYtN2FhNjhmOWY3NDcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2JiYTA1MjItM2ZkNS00NTFhLWJiNjYtN2FhNjhmOWY3NDcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Fine Line"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000560/","name":"Nick Nolte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000313/","name":"Jeff Bridges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000232/","name":"Sharon Stone"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911334/","name":"Matthew Warchus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093471/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010090/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001731/","name":"Sam Shepard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911334/","name":"Matthew Warchus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0390141/","name":"David Nicholls"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz
Outpost: Front wschodni
Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz
programme.desc: Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz: Directed by Kieran Parker. With Bryan Larkin, Iván Kamarás, Velibor Topic, Laurentiu Possa. In this third installment of the hit Nazi Zombie action horror movie, Outpost: Rise Of The Spetnaz, we discover the horrifying origins of these supernatural soldiers and see them in ferocious gladiatorial battle against the most ruthless and notorious of all military special forces: the Russian Spetsnaz." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2241403/","name":"Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4NzAwODEwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTMwNTQ2OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In this third installment of the hit Nazi Zombie action horror movie, Outpost: Rise Of The Spetnaz, we discover the horrifying origins of these supernatural soldiers and see them in ferocious gladiatorial battle against the most ruth","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2241403/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hobgoblinlol"},"dateCreated":"2013-11-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyable","reviewBody":"Honestly, don't know why it got 4.2 in my opinion the movie at least deserves 5.0-6.0 yes it is a cheesy sci-fi plot, but I think it is well executed. The thing I love about Outpost movies is the atmosphere and even though I think that the film took an odd turn by going back to WW2 to have an origin story it was still well done. But we can all see that the budget of the movie isn't completely as good as the first Outpost. The acting is decent and the action is good. Plot and the story maybe little bit too cheesy, but it's a Nazi zombie sci-fi flick so what do you expect? god father? I'm actually surprised with the stern treatment Outpost movies receive. Not to mention when people call ''Dead Snow'' good it's just eerie. Even Frankenstein's army has 5.0 than this considering the fact that it is not as good. War of the dead has 4.0 even though it's not an awful disaster. This one actually had some cameos and references from the previous films including the Beethoven song that starts randomly playing once in a while in all three films (very good touch in my opinion) as far as I am concerned the movie is definitely a 5.0 - 6.0/10. It wouldn't hurt to let the logic fly out and enjoy a cheesy flick that can grant you certain entertainment.\n\nIMDb and Rotten Tomatoes logic: if it's not a masterpiece, it's bad. Even though IMDb is a saint compared to Rotten Tomatoes. IMDb data; ttnr: 2241403, Title: Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz, --- Description: Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz: Directed by Kieran Parker. With Bryan Larkin, Iván Kamarás, Velibor Topic, Laurentiu Possa. In this third installment of the hit Nazi Zombie action horror movie, Outpost: Rise Of The Spetnaz, we discover the horrifying origins of these supernatural soldiers and see them in ferocious gladiatorial battle against the most ruthless and notorious of all military special forces: the Russian Spetsnaz." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2241403/","name":"Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4NzAwODEwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTMwNTQ2OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In this third installment of the hit Nazi Zombie action horror movie, Outpost: Rise Of The Spetnaz, we discover the horrifying origins of these supernatural soldiers and see them in ferocious gladiatorial battle against the most ruth","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2241403/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"hobgoblinlol","dateCreated":"2013-11-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyable","reviewBody":"Honestly, don't know why it got 4.2 in my opinion the movie at least deserves 5.0-6.0 yes it is a cheesy sci-fi plot, but I think it is well executed. The thing I love about Outpost movies is the atmosphere and even though I think that the film took an odd turn by going back to WW2 to have an origin story it was still well done. But we can all see that the budget of the movie isn't completely as good as the first Outpost. The acting is decent and the action is good. Plot and the story maybe little bit too cheesy, but it's a Nazi zombie sci-fi flick so what do you expect? god father? I'm actually surprised with the stern treatment Outpost movies receive. Not to mention when people call ''Dead Snow'' good it's just eerie. Even Frankenstein's army has 5.0 than this considering the fact that it is not as good. War of the dead has 4.0 even though it's not an awful disaster. This one actually had some cameos and references from the previous films including the Beethoven song that starts randomly playing once in a while in all three films (very good touch in my opinion) as far as I am concerned the movie is definitely a 5.0 - 6.0/10. It wouldn't hurt to let the logic fly out and enjoy a cheesy flick that can grant you certain entertainment.\n\nIMDb and Rotten Tomatoes logic: if it's not a masterpiece, it's bad. programme.title: Cherrypicker
Ratujmy mamę!
Cherrypicker
programme.desc:
Cherrypicker: Directed by Bennet De Brabandere. With Colin Mochrie, Peter Schoelier, Heidi von Palleske, Matia Jackett. Four adorable little girls plot to murder a hockey player after they mistake an act of lovemaking as an attack on their mom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6969954/","name":"Cherrypicker","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmYwMGQxYzktYTUwZi00OWQ5LWI2NmMtMjg1YmQzOTM0ZjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA1MjM4MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four adorable little girls plot to murder a hockey player after they mistake an act of lovemaking as an attack on their mom.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6969954/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"zalessky"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"This movie is completely crazy","reviewBody":"Ankle Biters (or Cherrypicker) is a story about four little girls who set out on a quest to destroy their mother's love life and harm their future stepdad, Sean (Zion Forest Lee). And they do succeed in a spectacular fashion.

It starts as a spoiled child comedy and feels kinda innocent. The girls just put spider eggs in Sean's ear and put a pin in an apple he's supposed to eat. But then, well, everything goes sideways. There's gore and there's death.

I was not impressed by acting - except for the four little girls who were just great. The actresses are real-life sisters Dahlia Reed, Violet Reed, Lily Reed and Rosalie Reed, and they keep their real names in this movie. So, not much in terms of acting, and some poor dialogs. But camera work is good, and blood specal effects really deliver.

It's nuts, and it's fun.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"genre":["Comedy","Horror"],"keywords":"black comedy,nudity,murder","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1553777433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmRkMTU2ZjYtMDBhYS00MjNlLWI0YzItNzVlMTUxMDcwOTIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmRkMTU2ZjYtMDBhYS00MjNlLWI0YzItNzVlMTUxMDcwOTIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four adorable little girls plot to murder a hockey player after they mistake an act of lovemaking as an attack on their mom."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595110/","name":"Colin Mochrie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2442703/","name":"Peter Schoelier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0902794/","name":"Heidi von Palleske"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3185193/","name":"Bennet De Brabandere"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0812060/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3185193/","name":"Bennet De Brabandere"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498500/","name":"Zion Forrest Lee"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lone Rider
Samotny jeździec
Lone Rider
programme.desc:
Lone Rider: Directed by David S. Cass Sr.. With Lou Diamond Phillips, Stacy Keach, Vincent Spano, Marta DuBois. With heartening family drama and adrenaline-pumping action, Lone Rider is a western with guts, glory, and a powerful message. Bob Hattaway, an honored soldier, returns to his Western hometown to discover that corrupt landowner Stu Croaker has become the most powerful man in the county. What Stu wants next is the Hattaway family business. And normally, what he wants, he gets. But when his strong-arm tactics turn deadly, Bob fights back with a vengeance. This is the West and it s going to get wild. Featuring an all-star cast including Lou Diamond Phillips, Vincent Spano, and Stacy Keach." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1092014/","name":"Lone Rider","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZlYTg3N2ItOGVkZC00OWEzLWE2YzktZDZkYWY4NWZmNDY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"With heartening family drama and adrenaline-pumping action, Lone Rider is a western with guts, glory, and a powerful message. Bob Hattaway, an honored soldier, returns to his Western hometown to discover that corrupt landowner Stu Cr","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1092014/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bkoganbing"},"dateCreated":"2008-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bares Resemblance To Anthony Mann/James Stewart Westerns","reviewBody":"In Lone Rider Lou Diamond Phillips returns to his small Texas town after war service and looks to settle down with his family. When he left there before the Civil War his parents and cousin had a prosperous ranch and a mercantile in town.

But while he's been away, a boyhood friend has become the town boss and is looking to take over the ranch and the mercantile. Lou's father Stacy Keach has borrowed for the store with a loan on the ranch which boyhood friend Vincent Spano wants paid in full.

Spano's moving on a few fronts in that town and in the tradition of many westerns the town looks for a champion and Lou fills the bill.

Lone Rider reminds me a whole lot of some of the Anthony Mann/James Stewart westerns of the Fifties. Phillips is playing a part that half a century ago Jimmy Stewart would have been playing. In fact there are distinct plot elements from The Far Country and Bend of the River in Lone Rider.

And fifty years ago Lone Rider would have been released on the big screen when westerns had more of a market and would have been acclaimed and enjoyed.

But for western fans like your's truly, we still enjoy them.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":442,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Western"],"datePublished":"2008-04-12","keywords":"family business,landowner,two word title","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001617/","name":"Lou Diamond Phillips"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005078/","name":"Stacy Keach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001759/","name":"Vincent Spano"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003180/","name":"David S. Cass Sr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209513/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0789041/","name":"Frank Sharp"}],"duration":"PT1H24M"}</script><metacontent="

An ATF agent goes undercover to retrieve stolen anthrax missiles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0217654/","name":"Militia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQwNDU0MTc3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTU0MTkxMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ATF agent goes undercover to retrieve stolen anthrax missiles.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0217654/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"macandbg"},"dateCreated":"2004-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"duh! this was just a bad movie...","reviewBody":"Like another reviewer I also saw this late at night with nothing better to do. ( I should have looked some more) I would like to add some more details to the rip-offs of scennes. Also at the end when they blew up Monte's House (Stacey Keach) the explosion was from the drug kingpin's house in Clear and Present Danger. 1 out of 10 stars..."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":796,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure"],"keywords":"bar,explosion,undercover,fistfight,bomb","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Militia","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2811625753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2E4YTA0ODItYzVhNi00NjI3LTkwYzYtNWJjYjUxOWE5YjAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2E4YTA0ODItYzVhNi00NjI3LTkwYzYtNWJjYjUxOWE5YjAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Avalanche"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001002/","name":"Dean Cain"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000884/","name":"Jennifer Beals"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002078/","name":"Frederic Forrest"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0691061/","name":"Jim Wynorski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0081580/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0490370/","name":"Steve Latshaw"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0676248/","name":"Fred Olen Ray"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Moguls
Amatorski projekt
The Moguls
programme.desc: The Moguls: Directed by Michael Traeger. With Jeff Bridges, Tim Blake Nelson, Joe Pantoliano, Ted Danson. Citizens of a small town, under the influence of a man in the midst of a mid-life crisis, come together to make an adult film." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0405163/","name":"The Moguls","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyNzQyOTQzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTYxNjQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Citizens of a small town, under the influence of a man in the midst of a mid-life crisis, come together to make an adult film.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0405163/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bgpetrarca"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"How could you not like this movie?","reviewBody":"For those of you in search of a movie that will make you laugh, here is your pick. I have read comments from users saying that this movie "didn't seem real" or "wasn't believable". To you, I ask: What did you think you were watching? I saw this screening at the Newport Film Festival and thought it was amazing. Some movies (gasp) are out there to entertain and this does just that... fantastically. It is a story that laughs at the ups and downs of the human experience while portraying the sometimes very harsh reality of middle-class struggle. It gives us a story we recognize to a certain extent, but garnishes it with a great variety of endearing characters. As an example the group of "guys" has a wonderfully accepted gay guy who asked the guys to call him MOOSE. (played oh-so-well by Ted Danson) We see the standard group of small town guys, going nowhere with their lives, yet they aren't the stereotypical unrelatable morons of modern day cinema; They, in a very round about and strange way, have morals and try to do well in life, despite their position. Go see this movie... it is a wonderful treat and a great time at the theatre.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6326,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-04-28","keywords":"small town,loser,adult filmmaking,pornographic film,hot","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Amateurs","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2207580441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmJkZDkwNzktZDNiMS00NzFhLThhYTktM2FhZDg5ODQ2ZjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmJkZDkwNzktZDNiMS00NzFhLThhYTktM2FhZDg5ODQ2ZjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Amateurs"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000313/","name":"Jeff Bridges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001101/","name":"Ted Danson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001592/","name":"Joe Pantoliano"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870592/","name":"Michael Traeger"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010508/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102795/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0107069/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870592/","name":"Michael Traeger"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 96 Minutes
96 minut
96 Minutes
programme.desc: 96 Minutes: Directed by Aimee Lagos. With Christian Serratos, Brittany Snow, David Oyelowo, Evan Ross. The story of 4 lives slammed together in a shocking moment. Intercutting between a carjacking and the separate stories of the 4 kids in Atlanta, we watch as they hurtle toward a life-changing end." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1641385/","name":"96 Minutes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxNjQ2ODM5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTM3NDk1Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of 4 lives slammed together in a shocking moment. Intercutting between a carjacking and the separate stories of the 4 kids in Atlanta, we watch as they hurtle toward a life-changing end.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1641385/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cosmo_tiger"},"dateCreated":"2012-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":""Crash" with teens. I liked it much more then I expected to. Pretty emotional and powerful. A good watch. I say B+","reviewBody":""I never should have gotten out of bed this morning." Carley (Snow) is about to graduate from college and her father isn't interested in attending. Lena (Serratos) just found out that her boyfriend is cheating on her. Dre (Ross) just found out that he will be able to graduate high school and finally has found a way out of gang life. Kevin (Trautmann) wants nothing more then to join a gang. When him and Dre get into an argument that ends up in carjacking the car that belongs to Carley with Lena has a passenger. The best way to describe this is "Crash" with teens. Total strangers who are all connected by one event that threatens to ruin all of them. This is very moving, powerful and intense. I highly recommend this one but much like "Crash" it's not really one you can watch over and over. The acting is great and the movie is a mix of flashbacks and current events that really make you feel connected to the characters and find your self sad and angry all at once. Overall, a surprisingly good movie that deserves to be watched. I give it a B+","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3282,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-10-14","keywords":"child with a gun,shooting a woman,woman in jeopardy,carjacking,atlanta georgia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"96 Minutes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1981719321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYxODE0MmItMmIwOC00NjQyLWFlYzEtNDVhNWNmM2M2MmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYxODE0MmItMmIwOC00NjQyLWFlYzEtNDVhNWNmM2M2MmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for 96 Minutes"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811242/","name":"Brittany Snow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1963091/","name":"Evan Ross"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2759438/","name":"Sharon Conley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1350938/","name":"Aimee Lagos"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0276411/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0321415/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193456/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1350938/","name":"Aimee Lagos"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Edge of Winter
U progu zimy
Edge of Winter
programme.desc:
Edge of Winter: Directed by Rob Connolly. With Joel Kinnaman, Percy Hynes White, Tom Holland, Rachelle Lefevre. When two brothers are stranded by a brutal winter storm with an unpredictable father they barely know, the boys begin to suspect their supposed protector may be their biggest threat." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4526546/","name":"Edge of Winter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzOTg5NDE5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM5MTA1OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When two brothers are stranded by a brutal winter storm with an unpredictable father they barely know, the boys begin to suspect their supposed protector may be their biggest threat.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4526546/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vegicat"},"dateCreated":"2016-08-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Acting, Decent Movie","reviewBody":"No idea why people are harshing on this movie. Yes, the plot is simple, but that's because it's not a horror flick or action flick - - it's a psychological family drama thriller. As in, tense.

There's beautiful scenery, minimal music, and other than a few scenes (not going to spoil that), most of what happens is fairly straightforward. Joel Kinnaman, looking a bit haggard, (the delicious co-star of The Killing) delivers top-notch acting, as do both of the boys. Their relationship and interaction is believable, and thankfully, there isn't any annoying precociousness or preciousness in the kid's characters. 

I'm not sure what people were expecting from the movie, but after reading some of the reviews/comments, I watched it anyway, and I wasn't disappointed. If you're looking for something with a lot of violence or gore, or some feel-good story with a dramatic ending, this isn't the film for you. If you are looking for a somewhat bleak story line with great acting, then check it out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3966,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-08-02","keywords":"brother brother relationship,father son relationship,teenage boy,winter,snow","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2060498713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODM0OTMwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ1OTA0OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODM0OTMwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ1OTA0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Recently divorced and laid off from his job, Elliot Baker (Joel Kinnaman, Suicide Squad; Run All Night) is desperate to spend more time bonding with his sons, Bradley (Tom Holland, Captain America: Civil War) and Caleb (Percy Hynes White, Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb). What starts as family day trip to teach his boys how to shoot turns into a nightmare when they become stranded. As they retreat to a desolate cabin, Elliot's mounting fear of losing custody pushes him to the edge. The brothers quickly realize that the man responsible for keeping them safe has now become their biggest threat."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1172478/","name":"Joel Kinnaman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4007171/","name":"Percy Hynes White"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4043618/","name":"Tom Holland"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2618128/","name":"Rob Connolly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0232635/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0496439/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0593227/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1954504/","name":"Kyle Mann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2618128/","name":"Rob Connolly"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: First Blood
Rambo: Pierwsza krew
First Blood
programme.desc: First Blood: Directed by Ted Kotcheff. With Sylvester Stallone, Richard Crenna, Brian Dennehy, Bill McKinney. A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0083944/","name":"First Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBmOWU2YWMtZGUzZi00YzRhLWJjNDAtYTUwNWVkNDcyZmU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083944/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Regalian_Captain"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The only good rambo movie","reviewBody":"How people can call this the worst one of the series or just a bad movie in general is beyond me. The action is actually believable and not something out of a video game. And the storyline is good and paints a good picture of life in America after the Vietnam war. Following the tale of the best of the best it is certainly not the best but very good. Better yet is the laughs that come from watching the bad cops get theirs. The only I have to complain about this movie is that the sequels were atrocious and painful. This is often looked over excellent movie that puts many other in the genre to shame. Many of you who find it boring are just gore junkies who thrive off of cheap explosions and a plethora of bullets in the air. Take it for a man trying to survive, not bringing down a whole army.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":239817,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1982-10-22","keywords":"abuse of power,corrupt sheriff,veteran,corrupt cop,bad cop","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rambo: First Blood","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1402863897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkY2FhOTgtODAzZi00YzUyLTk5ZWMtODZiNTM0YWI2MDhlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkY2FhOTgtODAzZi00YzUyLTk5ZWMtODZiNTM0YWI2MDhlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Artisan"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001133/","name":"Brian Dennehy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001077/","name":"Richard Crenna"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467646/","name":"Ted Kotcheff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055376/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0779514/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0231747/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0606251/","name":"David Morrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0468997/","name":"Michael Kozoll"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0755266/","name":"William Sackheim"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="
